```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(tidyverse)
library(skimr)
library(GGally)
```

Pairs Plot:
```{r, eval = FALSE} 

ggpairs(data = diamonds)

```

Scatterplot:
```{r}
ggplot(data = diamonds, mapping = aes(x = carat, y = price)) +
  geom_point(size = .5)
```

Histogram:
```{r}
ggplot(data = diamonds, mapping = aes(x = carat)) +
  geom_histogram()
```
